Under the proposed partnership, Nokia will adopt Windows Phone as its "principle smartphone strategy" and contribute its expertise on hardware design and language support to bring the software platform to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies. Nokia's Chief Executive Stephen Elop said that "Nokia and Microsoft will combine our strengths to deliver an ecosystem with unrivalled global reach and scale. It's now a three-horse race." Under BSF, every secondary school in England was due to be rebuilt or refurbished over a 15-20-year period at an estimated cost of? 55 billion. Michael Gove said the programme had been beset by massive overspends, tragic delays, botched construction projects and needless bureaucracy . The decision is a further embarrassment for the Education Secretary who was forced to apologise last summer after he released a flawed list of school building projects facing the axe.
